name: OX Tools Pro Aluminum Body Chalk Reel 6x Gear with Kevlar Reinforced Line | Strong Thick Bold Chalk Line | Chalk Line Tool | Chalk Box | KEVLAR line
short_description: Innovative line developed and built with Kevlar¨ for durability 20x stronger than standard line
Case is made from aluminum for ultimate durability on the jobsite
New hook design offers a strong grip and accuracy when snapping chalk lines
Designed to feel comfortable in the hand and remain comfortable all day
6 to 1 gear ratio makes for a quick rewind, saving time after snapping a chalk line
Length: 100-Foot
Gear Ratio: 6-to-1

innovative line developed and built with kevlar¨ for durability 20x stronger than standard line case is made from aluminum for ultimate durability on the jobsite new hook design offers a strong grip and accuracy when snapping chalk lines designed to feel comfortable in the hand and remain comfortable all day 6 to 1 gear ratio makes for a quick rewind, saving time after snapping a chalk line length: 100-foot gear ratio: 6-to-1

name: Keson G100 Little Giant Chalk Line Reel, 12-Ounce Chalk Capacity, 100-Foot
short_description: Heavy-Duty cord and pull ring
Hooks easily onto tool belt and holds almost a pound of chalk
One-piece steel crank for long life
ABS housing with metal handle
Cotton polycord holds chalk better and lasts longer than most lines
"Glovable" grip for cold weather or rough conditions
Huge BigMouth opening to ease fill up and a no-leak stopper to keep it shut until you want to chalk up
Rewind-Steel crank for long life
Recessed handle clasp stores the handle out of the way
String-Loose woven polyester that holds chalk until it's snapped right where you want it. 1/8th of an inch thick for bold lines.
product_description: At Keson, we’ve taken the time to learn a lot about chalk line reels from end-users. As the only US manufacturer of chalk and chalk line reels, we are in a unique position to interact and respond with the people who build in and build up our communities. These builders have told us a lot about what’s important in a chalk line reel, and what works and what doesn’t. We continuously add to and improve our chalk and chalk line reels based on the feedback from end-users.

name: TAJIMA Chalk Line - Chalk-Rite Jam Free Chalk Box with Extra Bold 1mm Snap Line & Five Gear Quick Retrieval - CR301JF
short_description: EXTRA-BOLD SNAP LINE - 1.0 mm braided nylon line produces clean, clear, accurate snaps for the precise layout results. Designed to work best with Tajima Micro Chalk and Snap Line Dye
FAST LINE RETRIEVAL - This Tajima chalk line's 5-gear, fast wind system allows for quick line retrieval of your marking string, saving you time on any busy construction jobsite
RUBBERIZED ABS CASE - High Capacity, lightweight ABS body with elastomer grip for added durability, protecting against drops and other worksite hazards
POSITIVE GEAR LINE LOCK - Line lock holds layout sting tight while snapping layout markings and automatically releases when winding this chalk line tool
EASY FILL NECK - Large chalk refill neck makes loading Tajima chalk line powder and Snap Line Dye quick, easy, and mess free, setting it above other construction tools
product_description: Compact and durable plastic chalk snap lines with 5 gears for fast, smooth and dependable rewinds. Equipped with 100 feet of premium-grade braided snap line, folding rewind cranks, and the positive gear-lock line holds. Jam Free.

name: Keson G3X150BOLD Bold Chalk Line Reel with 3X1 Rewind, 12-Ounce Chalk Capacity, 150-Foot
short_description: Ergonomic, glovable grip designed to reduce wrist strain
3x Rewind for fast line pay out and retrieval
ABS housing with metal handle
Made in the USA
12-Ounce capacity
product_description: At Keson, we’ve taken the time to learn a lot about chalk line reels from end-users. As the only US manufacturer of chalk and chalk line reels, we are in a unique position to interact and respond with the people who build in and build up our communities. These builders have told us a lot about what’s important in a chalk line reel, and what works and what doesn’t. We continuously add to and improve our chalk and chalk line reels based on the feedback from end-users.

name: Crescent Lufkin 100' Aluminum Chalk Reel - CLA100A
short_description: Sliding door for quick and easy chalk refilling
Cast aluminum body for increased durability
Centerline marker for use as a plumb bob
Built-in storage dock protects end hook when not in use
product_description: These Crescent Lufkin chalk reels have all the features pros want with the durability they need. With famous Crescent Lufkin quality, they’re the perfect choice for pros who demand value.

name: IRWIN Tools STRAIT-LINE COMPACT Chalk Reel, 30 ft. (IWHT48440)
short_description: COMPACT SIZE - For increased portability & easy storage
3:1 GEAR RATIO - For 3X faster line retraction
WIDE DOOR CHALK DOOR - Design for better ease of fill & vision in to the reel
NESTED HOOK STORAGE - For compact storage without unwanted hook snagging with the ability to grab the hook with gloves on
product_description: The IRWIN STRAIT-LINE COMPACT Chalk Reel features a convenient and compact design that makes it easy to store in a tool bag for tool box perfect for finishing PROs. Engineered with a nested hook dock prevents unwanted hook snagging and the ability to quickly hook and go with gloves on. Smoothly and quickly retract the line when the chalk is marked thanks to a 3:1 gear ratio, deisgned specifically to help professionals mark jobsites with speed and efficiency.

short_description: Brand: DEWALT
Manufacturer: DEWALT
Ergonomic shape for secure grip and feel

product_description: DEWALT chalk line reel, heavy duty, DEWALT, 100 ft. Line, polymer line, Blue line, 4 oz. Chalk, Folding crank handle, stainless steel handle, sliding door, stainless steel hook, 3: 1, high impact ABS body, yellow/black.

name: Milwaukee Tool 48-22-3986 Bold Line Chalk Reel (3-Pack)
short_description: Features strip guard clutch combined with planetary gear system to provide long gear life
Fast retraction ratio of 6:1
High strength braided bold line creates clear, bold lines and resists abrasion from tough jobsite conditions
Flush handle storage and rubber overmold
Set of 3
product_description: Milwaukee ELEC Tool 48-22-3986 Bold Line Chalk Reel. Set of 3.

name: Auto Dynasty Self-Chalking Chalk Line Reel with 100 ft. Plumb Bob Powder Snap Closure Built-in Line Level
short_description: Instant Reference Lines - Snap straight, accurate lines in seconds with this self-chalking cord. Its easy line-back reel allows you to re-chalk and snap additional lines.
Rugged Protection - Engineered to last, the 100ft cotton chalk cord is housed in a high-impact case that safeguards it from daily abrasions at demanding industrial job sites.
Built-In Precision - The cotton cord plumb bob incorporates a line level, enabling you to achieve the ideal temporary markings for a wide range of projects.
Double-Duty Functionality - Designed for precision, this chalk line doubles as a plumb bob and line level, simplifying marking tasks on walls and fences.
Complete Kit - This kit comprises a 100ft self-chalking cotton cord, a sturdy case, and chalk powder, all packaged together for your convenience. Material - Cotton (Chalk Cord).
